item.title: DJ Tremor Strikes Back
item.description: www.coologik.com providers of the finest DnB Dubplates on download present the second instalment of the Drum and Bass dubplate challenge as DJ Tremor steps up to the plate and squares up against the mighty Mr Gold. DJ Tremor throws dubs from all angles and with this PoDcast he gives you an Old School treat reaching back into his record box to bring you a retro mix of some of his favourite tunes from the past. Big tunes, big talent. Want the freshest dubplates on download so you can stand out from other DJ's? Then visit http://www.coologik.com today. Coologik.. Alive and Kicking

item.title: Heavyweight Dubplate showdown from Coologik.Com
item.description: Octobers DnB podcast from www.coologik.com brings Mr Gold back to the dubplate arena for some no holds barred dirty dubplate action. Tunes selected by the raveology and disconnekted resident Mr Gold (no place to hide by Mr Gold is now available for download at www.coologik.com/shop) including up and coming releases from www.coologik.com October will see this Podcast presented by coologik and mixed by Mr Gold going head to head with the next episode to be published mid month by none other than Londons very own DJ Tremor. DJ Tremor brings a flavour to his set that echos through to the tunes and dubplates he has available for download through www.coologik.com. One of the newest artists at coologik his tunes are banging. This the first part to this exclusive double header shows Mr Gold flexing up and throwing down first to represent Birmingham. Keep an eye out for more news when DJ Tremor steps up with his reply. Like the tunes? Download the freshest dubplates now at www.coologik.com Big tunes as standard

item.title: Mr Gold steps into the Dubplate arena
item.description: Stepping into the Coologik Dubplate Arena is none other than Birmingham based disconnected resident and Raveology favourite..Mr Gold Mr Gold also responsible for the forthcoming 5th release from Coologik Records entitled Zombie Stomp (which you can hear on this Podcast) is a rising star in the DnB scene. Remember promos are out now for the 4th release on coologik by Dungeon Beats (Who Knows / FYi) which is available on Promo from Chemical Records, Redeye and most online retailers and high street vinyl specialists. Mixing sharper than a knife and a selection of tunes guaranteed to keep you skanking all night Mr Gold delivers the Dubplate onslaught like no other. Like the tunes? Download them now at Coologik.Com number one for dubplates on download.

item.title: Lyrical Warfare - The Hierarchy Return
item.description: This episode is proudly bought to you in collaberation with The Hierachy. Rising drum and bass MC's the Hierachy spit lyrical fire over the rugged Dub Plate flow spun by DJ Ricochet. 100% dubplates as standard that you have come to expect from the coologik.com drum and bass artists. We want to thank you all for the support remember to spread the word and if you like the tunes, download them now at www.coologik.com. One love
